thread.section_title: Jomashop Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Jomashop | www.jomashop.com | 23 of 285
thread.title: Mike

author: Mike
title: Mike
text:
My wife was looking to get me a watch for Christmas and it turned out the one she got me wasn't really my style. Looking online I was referred to Joma Shop by multiple places (Reddit/Watch Seek) saying that Joma Shop was legit. They had excellent prices on all the brands I was considering. I ended up with a Seiko that I absolutely love. Shipping was fast, and the interaction went flawlessly.
I highly recommend them
